setup_script_description: Moves focus to the 'Size' menu item
task: read disabled menuitem in a submenu
specific_user_instruction: Open "Size" menu using the down arrow key | Navigate to 'X-Large" menuitem using the down arrow key | Activate "X-Large" menu item using the space key |Open "Size" menu using the down arrow key | Navigate to 'Larger" menuitem using the down arrow key | Review the 'Larger' menu item
output_assertions: The position of the item and number of items in the menubar  is conveyed
